H0.text: what was the most important new religious figure of the new kingdom of ancient egypt. Amun

H1.text: what was the most important new religious figure of the new kingdom of ancient egypt. Isis

H2.text: what was the most important new religious figure of the new kingdom of ancient egypt. Nekhbet

H3.text: what was the most important new religious figure of the new kingdom of ancient egypt. Aten

A4.text: Aten was the sole god of the Egyptian state religion during the reign of Akhenaten.

A5.text: Akhenaten changed his name to Akhenaten to reflect his close link with the supreme deity Aten.
